GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: A suspected ~y~prostitute~w~ has been reported, head to the scene ~y~pending further instructions~w~.
GENERAL.NOTIFICATION: You are approaching the scene. Park up so you ~y~won't be noticed~w~ by the suspect.
You are ~r~too close to the suspect~w~. Move further away to avoid being noticed.
You ~r~alerted the suspect.~n~~w~Because of this, we have been ~y~unable to gather evidence~w~.
Suspect has made contact with the vehicle. ~y~Speak with them and investigate.~w~
The vehicle is not affiliated with the ~y~suspect.~w~ Continue as you see fit.~w~

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~y~Bystander:~w~ Over here! Over here!
~y~Bystander:~w~ Please save her! Please!
~b~You:~w~ What's happened?
~y~Bystander:~w~ I was just on a walk, and I encountered this poor woman.
~b~You:~w~ Did you see what happened?
~y~Bystander:~w~ Unfortunately not, I wish I could've been here earlier. Maybe she would still be alive...
~b~You:~w~ And remind me - what were you doing when you found her?
~y~Bystander:~w~ Just walking, I live locally.
~b~You:~w~ As I am sure you'll understand, I need to complete some checks - if you could stay here, that would be great.
~b~You:~w~ M'am, I am going to need a word with you.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Officer, what can I help you with?
~b~You:~w~ We've had reports of solicitiation in this area. Would you know anything about that?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Oh god! Not me officer, you've got the wrong person.
~b~You:~w~ It's quite chilly today and you have very little clothes on.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Officer, I'm afraid that's not a crime. I am just heading off to a party, which has already started.
~b~You:~w~ According to our reports, you've been wandering around rather aimlessly.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm just a little lost, that's all. Can I get going now?
~b~You:~w~ Both of you - stay here for me. I need to have a quick chat.
~r~Suspect:~w~ What can I help you with?
~b~You:~w~ We've had reports of solicitation occuring in this area, would you know anything about?
~y~Victim:~w~ Yes! This woman has come up to my car, offering her 'services'...
~b~You:~w~ Is this true, m'am?
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm just here to do business. Consider me an entrepreneur.
~y~Victim:~w~ It's unwanted and disgusting - I don't want a prostitue near me! Arrest her officer!
~b~You:~w~ Let's keep things calm here, I'm going to deal with this now.

OUTCOME3.NOTIFICATION: The ~y~suspect~w~ has entered the vehicle.~n~~r~Perform a traffic stop as soon as possible and investigate from there~w~.
